page.title: 06Ormskirk Mains Services
page.content: The farms and cottages have Mains Electricity and we found a sub-station, but there are no mains sewers. Most of the farms have their own septic tanks, but one or two cottages still have no water closets at all. Water towers are still a common sight in this low-lying area, but as more houses are connected to the Mains so they are falling into disuse. We found only one and that not in use. For heating coal and gas are used. Some people use oil-stoves for cooking, others electricity. There is no gas in this area, but some people we spoke to told us they hope it will be soon brought in.
